Lehi.Lehi Commercial and Savings Bank-Lehi Ho:
The Lehi Commercial and Savings Bank-Lehi Hospital was a historic building in Lehi, Utah, USA. It has been demolished, but remains listed on the National Register of Historic Places.
Located at 206 E. State St. in Lehi, Utah, it was built in 1891 to serve the Lehi Commercial and Savings Bank, which has also been known as the Utah Banking Company.
